mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT TH_NUM , TH_NAME , TH_REGION , TH_ADDR , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY TH_NAME, TH_REGION ORDER BY TH_NUM) AS RN FROM THEATER) AS T WHERE T.RN = 1 AND TH_REGION = #{TH_REGION} ORDER BY TH_NUM;
SELECT FAV_THEATER FROM MEMBERS WHERE MEM_NUM = (SELECT MEM_NUM FROM MEMBERS WHERE MEM_ID = #{MEM_ID});

SELECT S.SC_NUM , DATE_FORMAT(S.SC_TIME, '%H:%i') AS SC_TIME , DATE_FORMAT(S.SC_TIME_END, '%H:%i') AS SC_TIME_END , C.CI_NUM , T.TH_NUM , T.TH_NUMBER , M.MOVIE_NUM , M.TITLE , M.TITLEENG , M.GENRE , DATE_FORMAT(M.RELEASEDATE, '%Y.%m.%d') AS RELEASEDATE , M.RUNTIME , M.RATING , DATEDIFF(M.RELEASEDATE, CURRENT_DATE()) AS D_DAY , M.SE_COUNT FROM CINEMA C LEFT OUTER JOIN THEATER T ON C.TH_NUM = T.TH_NUM LEFT OUTER JOIN SCREEN S ON C.CI_NUM = S.CI_NUM LEFT OUTER JOIN MOVIE M ON C.MOVIE_NUM = M.MOVIE_NUM LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT TH_NUM, SE_COUNT FROM MSEAT) M ON C.TH_NUM = M.TH_NUM WHERE T.TH_NUM IN (SELECT TH_NUM FROM THEATER WHERE TH_NAME = #{TH_NAME}) AND date_format(S.SC_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{DATE};
